info.title: TailorInch API
info.description: A brief description of your API

get.summary: Get clothes for a dress
get.description: Returns all clothes for a dress

200.description: List of clothes for the dress

post.summary: Create a new cloth for a dress
post.description: Creates a new cloth for a specific dress.

delete.description: Deletes a cloth based on the dress ID and cloth ID.

get.summary: Get discounts for an order
get.description: Retrieves all discounts associated with a specific order for the authenticated tailor.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: ID of the order to fetch discounts for

200.description: List of discounts for the order

post.description: Adds a new discount to a specific order for the authenticated tailor.
Deletes a specific discount by its ID for the authenticated tailor.

parameters.name: discount_id
parameters.description: ID of the discount to delete

200.description: Discount deleted successfully or already deleted

post.summary: Create a dress with related entities
Upload audio file for a dress
post.description: Uploads an audio file, calculates its duration, and stores it.

data.description: Duration of the uploaded audio in HH:mm:ss format

get.summary: Get a list of tailor dresses based on filters

parameters.name: timeFilter
parameters.description: Filter dresses based on time (e.g., all, today, due, late, last15days, thismonth, lastmonth, thisyear, lastyear)

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Number of orders to retrieve per page

post.description: Creates a new dress for a specific order and shop.

get.summary: Count dresses by status
get.description: Counts the number of dresses by their status for a specific shop.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: ID of the shop to filter dresses

get.summary: Get dresses for a specific order
get.description: Retrieves a list of dresses associated with a specific order, based on the tailor's authentication.

post.summary: Update the status of a dress
post.description: Allows a tailor to update the status of a dress based on dress ID.

dress_id.description: ID of the dress to update

message.example: Dress Status could not be updated

get.summary: Get a dress by ID
get.description: Retrieves a dress by its ID, including its measurement, clothes, and images.

message.example: An error occurred while retrieving the dress

get.summary: Get basic details for a dress
get.description: Returns basic details for a dress based on the dress ID.

put.summary: Update basic details for a dress
put.description: Allows a tailor to update basic details for a dress based on the dress ID.

get.summary: Get instructions and audio for a dress
get.description: Allows a tailor to retrieve instructions and audio for a dress based on the dress ID.

put.summary: Update instructions and audio for a dress
put.description: Allows a tailor to update instructions and audio for a dress based on the dress ID.

get.summary: Get images for a dress
get.description: Returns a list of images for a dress based on the dress ID.

200.description: List of images for the dress

delete.description: Deletes a design image based on the design ID.

get.summary: Get order expenses
get.description: Retrieves a list of expenses associated with a specific order.

post.description: Stores a new expense record in the database.
Deletes an expense by its ID.

get.summary: Get dress measurements

post.description: Adds new measurements with the specified values for a dress.

schema.description: The ID of the new measurement

get.summary: Get the measurement of a dress
get.description: Allows a tailor to get the measurement of a dress based on dress ID.

put.summary: Update the measurement of a dress
put.description: Allows a tailor to update the measurement of a dress based on the dress ID.

requestBody.description: Measurement data to update the dress

tcp_id.description: ID of the tailoring control point

post.summary: Update the status of an order
post.description: Allows a tailor to update the status of an order based on order ID.

order_id.description: ID of the order to update

get.summary: Retrieve paginated recent orders for a tailor
get.description: Fetches paginated recent orders for the authenticated tailor with statuses 0 or 1, sorted by creation date in descending order.

post.description: Creates an empty order for a specific customer

get.summary: Fetch orders based on tab selection
get.description: Retrieves orders based on the specified tab.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Number of orders to retrieve per page

get.summary: Get order amounts summary
get.description: Retrieves a summary of total dress amount, expenses, discounts, and payments for a given order.

200.description: Successful response with order amount summary

get.summary: Get Order Detals
get.description: Retrieves a list of dresses associated with a specific order, based on the tailor's authentication.

get.summary: Get all parameters
Get all payments for a tailor
get.description: Retrieves all payments associated with the authenticated tailor.

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Number of orders to retrieve per page

get.summary: Get payments for an order
get.description: Retrieves all payments associated with a specific order for the authenticated tailor.

post.description: Creates a new payment record for an order.
Deletes a payment by its ID.

parameters.name: payment_id
parameters.description: ID of the payment to delete

404.description: Payment not found or already deleted

get.summary: Get all categories for a tailor

post.summary: Update the status of a category

get.summary: Get all categories for a tailor with existing status

post.summary: Store a new category for a tailor

422.description: Category Validation Error / Category Creation Failed

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the category to be updated

post.summary: Delete a category for a specific tailor

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: The ID of the category to delete

200.description: Category deleted successfully or Category deactivated successfully

get.summary: Get parameters by tailor and category
Get all questions of tailor

question.example: Specify the collar style for the garment

message.example: No Questions to show in this category

get.summary: Get questions by tailor and category

question.example: Specify the collar style for the garment

message.example: No Questions to show in this category

get.summary: Get questions for a dress
get.description: Returns a list of questions for a dress based on the dress ID.

put.description: Updates the questions for a dress based on the dress ID.

get.summary: Check if username exists

number.description: Unique mobile number of the tailor

422.description: Validation Failed / Incorrect Mobile number password

get.summary: Retrieve a paginated list of customers for the authenticated tailor

parameters.name: perpage
parameters.description: Number of customers to retrieve per page

get.summary: Get orders for a specific customer by the authenticated tailor
get.description: Returns a list of orders placed by the specified customer for the currently authenticated tailor

get.summary: Get payments for a specific customer by the authenticated tailor
get.description: Returns a list of payments made by the specified customer to the currently authenticated tailor

get.summary: Show customer by ID
get.description: Retrieve details of a customer by their ID

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to retrieve.

get.summary: Search for customers by name or number

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Text to search for in customer name or number

post.description: Store a new customer associated with a tailor. If a customer already exists for the tailor, an error is returned.

customer_id.description: ID of the customer to be updated.

post.summary: Delete a customer for the authenticated tailor

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer to delete

message.example: An error occurred while retrieving the measurement

bearerAuth.description: Use a Bearer token to authorize requests
bearerAuth.name: Authorization
